description: Review `DeriveTableScopesAndKeysStep.cs` and ensure class-level + method-level documentation explains table-scope discovery and key/ordinal rules.
steps-to-verify: Open `src/dms/backend/EdFi.DataManagementService.Backend.RelationalModel/DeriveTableScopesAndKeysStep.cs` and confirm the class summary describes: root table `$`, child table per array path, composite key parts, and deterministic traversal.
Confirm `Execute(...)` and all helper methods have concise XML documentation that matches current behavior (skips `_ext`, ignores `additionalProperties`, orders properties ordinally).

description: Review `DeriveColumnsAndDescriptorEdgesStep.cs` and ensure documentation explains inlined object traversal, array-table routing, and nullability rules.
steps-to-verify: Open `src/dms/backend/EdFi.DataManagementService.Backend.RelationalModel/DeriveColumnsAndDescriptorEdgesStep.cs` and confirm the class summary documents: object inlining, array child-table scope selection, descriptor FK handling, and nullability derivation.
Confirm `Execute(...)` and traversal helpers (`Walk*`, type resolvers, and `TableBuilder`) have XML documentation describing intent and error behavior (collisions, missing metadata).

description: Review `ValidateJsonSchemaStep.cs` and ensure documentation states the supported JSON Schema subset and the closed-world `additionalProperties` contract.
steps-to-verify: Open `src/dms/backend/EdFi.DataManagementService.Backend.RelationalModel/ValidateJsonSchemaStep.cs` and confirm the class summary explains: dereferenced/expanded schema expectation, unsupported keyword failures, and `additionalProperties` pruning (not traversed).
Confirm `Execute(...)` and validation helpers have XML documentation that matches the current array item rules (object items except descriptor scalar arrays).

description: Review `JsonSchemaUnsupportedKeywordValidator.cs` and ensure documentation clarifies what is rejected and why validation is path-inclusive.
steps-to-verify: Open `src/dms/backend/EdFi.DataManagementService.Backend.RelationalModel/JsonSchemaUnsupportedKeywordValidator.cs` and confirm the summary explains the dereferenced-schema contract and the unsupported keyword set.
Confirm `Validate(...)` includes XML documentation and callers supply meaningful traversal paths.

description: Review `JsonSchemaTraversalConventions.cs` and ensure documentation explains how schema kind is inferred with/without explicit `type`.
steps-to-verify: Open `src/dms/backend/EdFi.DataManagementService.Backend.RelationalModel/JsonSchemaTraversalConventions.cs` and confirm `SchemaKind` and `DetermineSchemaKind(...)` are documented.
Confirm private helpers (`GetSchemaType`, root-object error helpers) have method-level comments.

description: Review `JsonPathExpressionCompiler.cs` and ensure documentation describes supported JSONPath syntax and canonicalization rules.
steps-to-verify: Open `src/dms/backend/EdFi.DataManagementService.Backend.RelationalModel/JsonPathExpressionCompiler.cs` and confirm the supported syntax is documented (`$`, `.property`, `[*]`).
Confirm `Compile(...)`, `FromSegments(...)`, and validation helpers have method-level comments.

description: Review `RelationalNameConventions.cs` and ensure naming rules are documented (schema normalization, PascalCase identifiers, and key/ordinal column naming).
steps-to-verify: Open `src/dms/backend/EdFi.DataManagementService.Backend.RelationalModel/RelationalNameConventions.cs` and confirm the class summary explains the deterministic, cross-database-safe naming policy.
Confirm public helpers (schema normalization, collection base naming, key-part column naming, and FK naming) have method-level XML documentation.

description: Review `RelationalModelInputTypes.cs` and ensure descriptor/decimal metadata inputs are documented.
steps-to-verify: Open `src/dms/backend/EdFi.DataManagementService.Backend.RelationalModel/RelationalModelInputTypes.cs` and confirm `DescriptorPathInfo` and `DecimalPropertyValidationInfo` have XML summaries and `<param ...>` documentation.
Confirm parameter docs describe how these inputs affect derived column types (descriptor FKs and decimal precision/scale).

description: Review `RelationalModelBuilderPipeline.cs` and ensure context properties are documented (especially schema/metadata inputs).
steps-to-verify: Open `src/dms/backend/EdFi.DataManagementService.Backend.RelationalModel/RelationalModelBuilderPipeline.cs` and confirm `IRelationalModelBuilderStep`, `RelationalModelBuilderContext`, and `RelationalModelBuilderPipeline` have class/method documentation.

Confirm important `RelationalModelBuilderContext` properties have XML documentation describing their role in derivation (identity paths, descriptor paths, decimal metadata, and maxLength omission paths).

description: Review `RelationalModelTypes.cs` and ensure core types/enums have documentation for important parameters/properties.
steps-to-verify: Open `src/dms/backend/EdFi.DataManagementService.Backend.RelationalModel/RelationalModelTypes.cs` and confirm public records/enums have XML summaries.
Confirm important record parameters are documented via `<param ...>` tags (resource names, table scope, key columns, scalar type metadata, and edge/binding metadata).

description: Review `DeriveTableScopesAndKeysStepTests.cs` and ensure the nested-collections/key-derivation intent is self-evident; add comments only where needed.
steps-to-verify: Open `src/dms/backend/EdFi.DataManagementService.Backend.RelationalModel.Tests.Unit/DeriveTableScopesAndKeysStepTests.cs` and confirm the fixture and assertions clearly cover: root scope `$`, nested array table creation, and composite key parts/ordinals.
If any assertion depends on a non-obvious convention (e.g., naming/ordinal inheritance), add a brief comment explaining the rule being verified.

description: Review `DeriveColumnsAndDescriptorEdgesStepTests.cs` and add comments where test intent is not obvious (descriptor special cases and `additionalProperties` pruning).
steps-to-verify: Open `src/dms/backend/EdFi.DataManagementService.Backend.RelationalModel.Tests.Unit/DeriveColumnsAndDescriptorEdgesStepTests.cs` and confirm tests cover: inlined object scalars, descriptor FK replacement, collisions, decimals, and additionalProperties ignore behavior.
Confirm any non-obvious setup (e.g., bypassing the full pipeline in the test helper) has a short comment explaining why.

description: Review `ValidateJsonSchemaStepTests.cs` and add comments where the intent could be misread (especially `additionalProperties` behavior).
steps-to-verify: Open `src/dms/backend/EdFi.DataManagementService.Backend.RelationalModel.Tests.Unit/ValidateJsonSchemaStepTests.cs` and confirm tests cover: unsupported keywords, root shape, array item rules, descriptor scalar array allowance, and additionalProperties variants.
Confirm any intentionally-ignored unsupported keywords nested under `additionalProperties` are explained with a short comment.

description: Run DMS solution build and relational-model unit tests after documentation updates.
steps-to-verify: Run: `dotnet test --no-restore ./src/dms/backend/EdFi.DataManagementService.Backend.RelationalModel.Tests.Unit/EdFi.DataManagementService.Backend.RelationalModel.Tests.Unit.csproj`
Run: `dotnet build --no-restore ./src/dms/EdFi.DataManagementService.sln`
